entry.title: See the scence at 5:00amÂ again
entry.summary:
Went to bed at 5:00am last night

or, this morning

Saw the dawn scene of Changsha again

alone, not lonely

tired, but exited

fell into sleep with hope and prospect

with more responsibilty

for the engels by my side
entry.content:

with more responsibilty

for the engels by my side
